DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether culturally-tailored video great impact increase mammography use Chinese American woman improve barrier mammography screen compare generic , non-tailored video print fact sheet ( control group ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine efficacy culturally-tailored video increase mammography use among non-adherent Chinese woman ( vs. generic video control fact sheet ) . A total 671 Chinese American woman metropolitan Washington , DC New York city enrol participate study . The majority participant recruit on-site community event recruit public advertisement referral . Participants complete baseline assessment randomize one three group : 1 ) view 18-minute cultural video , 2 ) view 18-minute generic video , 3 ) reading fact sheet ( control group ) . Participants interview twice intervention:1 ) process evaluation 2-4 week post intervention regard participant ' feedback material repeat key measure knowledge , cultural view , health belief 2 ) outcome evaluation six-months post intervention assess actual receipt mammography use .
DOC.criteria: Chinese American woman mammography past 12 month Chinese American woman personal history breast cancer Chinese American woman mammogram schedule enrol NonChinese Women Regular mammography user
